wiki-import.fetchError: Error while downloading requested page. Possibly due to CORS issue.
wiki-import.settings.infoboxes.name: Additional infoboxes
wiki-import.settings.infoboxes.hint: List all additional infobox template names you want to parse delimited by `;` character.
wiki-import.settings.downloadImages.name: Download images
wiki-import.settings.downloadImages.hint: If set to true will attempt to download images to local directory. Will fallback to regular behavior if behind CORS or any other issue happens.
wiki-import.settings.useQuickInsert.name: Use quick-insert
wiki-import.settings.useQuickInsert.hint: If set to true it will try to find matching links in compendia using quick-insert search. This can be slow due to amount of links checked.
wiki-import.settings.autoCapitalizeLinks: First letter of each local link will be capitalized. This will not change displayed text for the link. Sample result: @JournalEntry[EBay]{eBay} instead of @JournalEntry[eBay]{eBay}.
